name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-proactive-installation-nodejs
title: Proactive Installation Sample App
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates proactive installation of a Teams app and sending notifications to users using Microsoft Graph APIs.
longDescription: This sample app showcases proactive installation of a Microsoft Teams application, enabling notifications to users through Microsoft Graph APIs in Group Chats and Channels. It features a bot for interaction, facilitating seamless user engagement and efficient app management.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing proactive installation sample app

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
